(A27 → (A26 ∨ (A24 ∨ A25))).natural: Under the condition that the research team gained recognition from the community, then either the research team won an innovation prize award, or the research team attended a biomedical summit conference, or the research team presented findings at a symposium.

(A28 → (A27 → (A26 ∨ (A24 ∨ A25)))).natural: When the research team increased funding investment, then if the research team gained recognition from the community, it follows that either the research team won an innovation prize award, or the research team attended a biomedical summit conference, or the research team presented findings at a symposium.

(A29 → (A28 → (A27 → (A26 ∨ (A24 ∨ A25)).prover9_expression: (formed_consortium(research_team, partners) -> (increased_funding(research_team, investment) -> (gained_recognition(research_team, community) -> (won_award(research_team, innovation_prize) | (attended_conference(research_team, biomedical_summit) | presented_findings(research_team, symposium))))))
(A29 → (A28 → (A27 → (A26 ∨ (A24 ∨ A25)).natural: Provided that the research team formed a consortium with partners, then if the research team increased funding investment, and if the research team gained recognition from the community, then either the research team won an innovation prize award, or the research team attended a biomedical summit conference, or the research team presented findings at a symposium.

(A29 ∨ A30).natural: Either the research team formed a consortium with partners or the research team joined a global health initiative.

(A3 → A2).natural: If the research team developed diagnostic tool technology, then the research team published a paper in a journal.

(A30 → (A28 → (A27 → (A26 ∨ (A24 ∨ A25)).prover9_expression: (joined_initiative(research_team, global_health) -> (increased_funding(research_team, investment) -> (gained_recognition(research_team, community) -> (won_award(research_team, innovation_prize) | (attended_conference(research_team, biomedical_summit) | presented_findings(research_team, symposium))))))
(A30 → (A28 → (A27 → (A26 ∨ (A24 ∨ A25)).natural: Assuming the research team joined a global health initiative, then if the research team increased funding investment, and if the research team gained recognition from the community, then either the research team won an innovation prize award, or the research team attended a biomedical summit conference, or the research team presented findings at a symposium.

(A31 → A33).natural: Whenever the research team detected a disease outbreak, the research team issued an alert to authorities.

(A31 → G).natural: Provided that the research team detected a disease outbreak, the research team received funding from venture capital.

(A31 ∨ A32).natural: Either the research team detected a disease outbreak or the research team monitored spread across regions.

(A32 → G).natural: Under the condition that the research team monitored spread across regions, the research team received funding from venture capital.

(A33 → G).natural: If the research team issued an alert to authorities, then the research team received funding from venture capital.

(A35 → A34).natural: In case the research team prevented an epidemic in the population, the research team contained a pathogen threat.

(A36 → A35).natural: When the research team protected vulnerable group communities, the research team prevented an epidemic in the population.

(A37 → A38).natural: Should the research team face methodology criticism, the research team retracted a study publication.

(A37 ∨ (A31 → G)).natural: The research team faced methodology criticism, or if the research team detected a disease outbreak, then the research team received funding from venture capital.

(A38 → A39).natural: Provided that the research team retracted a study publication, the research team corrected data analysis.

(A39 → A40).natural: Under the condition that the research team corrected data analysis, the research team validated results through replication.

(A39 → ¬A40).natural: When the research team corrected data analysis, it is not the case that the research team validated results through replication.

(A42 → A43).natural: If the research team published a correction erratum, then the research team acknowledged error within the team.

(A42 → ¬A43).natural: Provided that the research team published a correction erratum, then it is not the case that the research team acknowledged error within the team.

(A44 ∨ (¬(A33 → G) → A34)).natural: Either the research team lost funding from a sponsor, or if it is not the case that when the research team issued an alert to authorities then the research team received funding from venture capital, then the research team contained a pathogen threat.

(A45 → ¬A44).natural: In the event that the research team secured a grant from a foundation, then the research team did not lose funding from a sponsor.

(A46 → (A33 → G)).natural: Under the condition that the research team renewed a contract with a pharma company, then if the research team issued an alert to authorities, the research team received funding from venture capital.

(A46 ∨ A47).natural: Either the research team renewed a contract with a pharma company or the research team extended the project timeline.

(A47 → (A33 → G)).natural: Provided that the research team extended the project timeline, then if the research team issued an alert to authorities, the research team received funding from venture capital.

(A48 → (A46 → (A33 → G))).natural: When the research team scaled operations capacity, then if the research team renewed a contract with a pharma company, and if the research team issued an alert to authorities, then the research team received funding from venture capital.

(A48 ∨ A49).natural: Either the research team scaled operations capacity or the research team optimized workflow efficiency.

(A49 → (A46 → (A33 → G))).natural: Provided that the research team optimized workflow efficiency, then if the research team renewed a contract with a pharma company, and if the research team issued an alert to authorities, then the research team received funding from venture capital.

(A5 ∨ ¬A4).natural: Either the research team has collaboration with a university lab or the research team did not discover a cure for bacterial pneumonia.

(A7 ∨ (¬G → A6)).natural: Either the research team secured a patent for a drug formula or, if the research team did not receive funding from venture capital, then the research team identified a genetic variant mutation.

(A8 ∨ (A7 ∨ (¬G → A6))).natural: Either the research team conducted a phase 3 trial, or the research team secured a patent for a drug formula, or if the research team did not receive funding from venture capital, then the research team identified a genetic variant mutation.

(A9 → A8).natural: If the research team received approval from a regulatory agency, then the research team conducted a phase 3 trial.

(¬(A33 → G) → A34).natural: Should it not be the case that if the research team issued an alert to authorities then the research team received funding from venture capital, then the research team contained a pathogen threat.

(¬(A33 → G) → A36).natural: Provided that it is not the case that if the research team issued an alert to authorities then the research team received funding from venture capital, then the research team protected vulnerable group communities.

(¬(A39 → A40) → ¬A41).natural: If it is not the case that when the research team corrected data analysis then the research team validated results through replication, then it is not the case that the research team restored credibility with peers.

(¬(¬(A39 → A40) → ¬A41) → A42).natural: Should it not be the case that if it is not the case that when the research team corrected data analysis then the research team validated results through replication then it is not the case that the research team restored credibility with peers, then the research team published a correction erratum.

(¬A3 → A4).natural: Provided that the research team did not develop diagnostic tool technology, then the research team discovered a cure for bacterial pneumonia.

(¬G → A6).natural: If the research team did not receive funding from venture capital, then the research team identified a genetic variant mutation.
